description: Comparing even the simplest data can be complex as we try to measure how our governments are doing.
title: Coronavirus: How to tell which countries are coping best with Covid
title_page: Coronavirus: How to tell which countries are coping best with Covid - BBC News
maintext: He was surprised. "Honestly," he said, "you can look at the TV every night and see an expert in Stockholm, or in London, or in Paris, say something slightly different. But of course they're all experts. It's too early now for comparison. Maybe that will be possible next year, maybe we'll have to wait until the year after, but not now."
